actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to amend the repayment contract of the Mirage Flats Irrigation District.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to amend a repayment contract of the Mirage Flats Irrigation District, and to supply electric power to the district.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to amend the repayment contract of the Mirage Flats Irrigation District.
